title: Our Nation’s Weak Asylum Laws are Encouraging an Overwhelming Increase In Illegal Immigration – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
November 1, 2018
We will not rest until our border is secure, our citizens are safe, and we finally end the immigration crisis once and for all.
						President Donald J. Trump					MISUSED ASYLUM LAWS: Flaws in our asylum system allow illegal aliens with meritless claims to cross our borders and remain here for years. AN OVERWHELMING SURGE: Our country faces a growing and overwhelming surge of illegal aliens seeking to take advantage of our weak asylum laws.A DRIVING FACTOR IN ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION: The standards that apply to the credible fear process is a major driver of our Nation’s immigration crisis.
